summary_md: In 2024, Azerbaijan's per capita GDP stands at 5,871 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.21% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 5.59% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 74.43 years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage is at 89.00% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's share of global exports is 45.90% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
